column4: Please help analyze problem: in KDE, Dolphin connects via sftp to my other machine, propts for user and pass. I enter the correct values, and it fails to log on. using ssh works fine. using nautilus works fine. using filezilla works fine. what could be wrong with dolphin?
What error msg does it return?
it simply prompts me to try again.
Maybe you'll get an informative error msg if you run dolphin from command line and try to login
